analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho
analyzed: anidassana sappaṭigham sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sappaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana sappaṭigham sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sa paṭighaḥ ca na a nidassana sa paṭighaḥ na sa paṭighaḥ

original: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.

analyzed: anidassana appaṭigham appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na appaṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ

original: naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: na appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham appaṭigham dhamma

original: paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca
analyzed: paṭicca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na appaṭighaḥ ca na a nidassana appaṭighaḥ na appaṭighaḥ ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
